description: Try our easy to follow Ingham's Honey Mustard Turkey Wrap recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Wrap,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Turkey,Sesame free,Dairy free
name: Ingham's Honey Mustard Turkey Wrap Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook breast strips in a fry pan for 2 minutes at a medium/high temperature (until breast strips are lightly browned).
Preheat frying pan with vegetable oil.
Remove steaks from packaging and season with salt and pepper.
Cook on high heat for 1 minute each side or until cooked through.
Once cooked, cut breast steaks in half and place on wrap adding leafy mix and a teaspoon of dressing.
Tightly roll wrap and serve whole as a great meal option, or.
Tightly roll wrap and place toothpicks along wrap to keep together and cut into bite size pieces to serve as finger food.
